title: Exterior Storage, Vaulted Ceiling, Hardwood/Ceramic-Style Flooring
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 676 Sq.
The perfect blend of outdoor bliss and residential convenience, Canopy Apartment Homes provide easy access to recreational activities, as well as beautiful, modern interiors.
Finding the ideal Everett apartments for your family means looking at all the amenities, the features of your new neighborhood, and the apartment community’s available floor plans.
We think you’ll find each of these features to your liking, particularly if you’re searching for a little luxury that’s also within arm’s reach of the pleasant community of Everett, Washington.

Walk-in Closets, Vaulted Ceiling, Ceiling Fans, Cozy Wood Burning Fireplace, Exterior Storage, Quartz Countertops, Full Sized Washer & Dryer In Unit, High Speed Internet Available, Plush Carpeting, Hardwood/Ceramic-Style Flooring, Cable Ready, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Balcony/Deck/Patio

Spa/Hot Tub, Covered Parking Available, Elegant Clubhouse with Wi-Fi Capability, Indoor and Outdoor Sparkling Swimming Pools, Well-Appointed Fitness Center, Basketball Court, Easy Online Rent Pay, Close to major employers such as Boeing, BF Goodrich and Fluke, Resident Business Center
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
